Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Requires the MTA to file a copy of proposed station closings with various governmental agencies
Summary: Requires the MTA to file a copy of proposed station closings with various governmental agencies; provides that the MTA shall hold a public hearing on any proposed closings.
LawCode: Amd ยง1205, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to requiring the MTA to post a schedule of station closings
